tool_description: Identifies and handles outliers in market data using statistical and domain-specific methods, with options for removal or adjustment.

input_data.description: Path to the market data for outlier detection

detection_method.description: Outlier detection method (iqr, zscore, isolation_forest, price_jump)

action.description: Action for outliers (flag, remove, cap, replace)

price_columns.description: Price columns to analyze for outliers

error_messages: Invalid input data: Cannot access the specified dataset or data is corrupted
Unsupported detection method: Use supported methods (iqr, zscore, isolation_forest, price_jump)
Invalid sensitivity: Sensitivity must be between 0.5 and 10.0
Invalid action: Use supported actions (flag, remove, cap, replace)
Missing price columns: One or more specified price columns not found in dataset
usage: Provide input data path and optionally configure detection method, sensitivity, action, and price columns. Returns processed data with outlier information.

action_taken.description: Summary of actions performed on outliers
